sentence.Network_en: His death was a senseless waste of life.
sentence.Network_cn: 他白浪费了性命，死得毫无意义。

sentence.Network_en: The thugs beat him senseless with a baseball bat.
sentence.Network_cn: 暴徒用棒球棒把他打得失去了知觉.

sentence.Network_en: The branch of a tree knocked one of the horsewomen senseless.
sentence.Network_cn: 一根树枝撞得一名女骑手昏了过去.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... sense 感官 senseless 无知觉的 sensibility 感性.
大学英语六级词汇表_大学六级 ... sensation n． 感觉，知觉；轰动 senseless a． 愚蠢的，无意义的 sensible a． 明智的，合理的.
赵丽词汇5500最新——可下载_英语_天涯部落 ... sensitive paper 感光纸 senseless 无感觉的 mental 精神的.
无字的解释--... ... 无畏〖 undauntedness;fearless〗 无谓〖 meaningless;pointless;senseless〗 甚无谓也。——《资治通鉴》〖 petty …

list.abs: senseless violence ., 无意义的暴力.
He put forward some senseless proposals at the meeting ., 他在会上提出了几个愚蠢的建议.
senseless adj. 不省人事的fall senseless 晕倒sensible adj. 明智的,通晓道理的
the senseless senator's pretense of consensus caused a sensation愚蠢参议员的舆论借口引起了轰动。

entry.tran: 无意义的;无目的的;没有益处的
entry.def: If you describe an action as senseless, you think it is wrong because it has no purpose and produces no benefit.

example.ex: ...people whose lives have been destroyed by acts of senseless violence...
example.tran: 生活被那些无谓的暴力行为所毁的人们

example.ex: If your child is thirsty for learning, then it is senseless to hold her back.
example.tran: 如果你的孩子渴望学习，那就不要毫无益处地进行阻拦。

entry.tran: 失去知觉的;不省人事的
entry.def: If someone is senseless, they are unconscious.

example.ex: They were knocked to the ground, beaten senseless and robbed of their wallets...
example.tran: 他们遭重拳击倒在地，被打得不省人事，钱包也被抢走了。

example.ex: Then I saw my boy lying senseless on the floor.
example.tran: 然后我看见儿子人事不知地躺在地板上。

means.word_mean: 1. not marked by the use of reason;

sentences.sentence: "he lay insensible where he had fallen"

means.word_mean: 4. (of especially persons) lacking sense or understanding or judgment

auth_sentence.content: This attack appears to be totally senseless and random.
auth_sentence.res_content: This attack appears to be totally senseless and random.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This attack appears to be totally senseless and random.

auth_sentence.content: Hostility toward others can explode into senseless violence.
auth_sentence.res_content: Hostility toward others can explode into senseless violence.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Hostility toward others can explode into senseless violence.

auth_sentence.content: Opponents simply exchanged blows until one surrendered or was knocked senseless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Opponents simply exchanged blows until one surrendered or was knocked senseless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Opponents simply exchanged blows until one surrendered or was knocked senseless.

means.word_mean: 无知觉的, 不省人事的

sentences.en: He lay senseless out in the rain.
sentences.cn: 他毫无知觉地躺在雨中。
他救醒了那个失去知觉的小孩。

sentences.en: What a senseless fellow he is!
It was an absolutely senseless act of violence.
sentences.cn: 这是毫无意义的暴力行为。

sentences.en: It’s about time we called a halt to all this senseless arguing.
sentences.cn: 现在正是我们停止一切无谓争论的时候了。
